amendment.description: To establish a Domestic Nuclear Detection Office with the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4932 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4932 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S9567-9574; text: CR S9568-9569) To establish a Domestic Nuclear Detection Office with the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4932 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4932 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Domenici.
